ability.Unaware: This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's def/spd stat stages when doing damage.

Torch Song.effect: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.

Shadow Ball.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Substitute.effect: The user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP and sets a substitute with the same amount of HP to take damage from attacks for it. The substitute is removed once enough damage (1/4 of max HP) is inflicted. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining, or if it already has a substitute.

Slack Off.effect: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP.

Yawn.effect: Causes the target to fall asleep at the end of the next turn. Fails if the target already has a non-volatile status condition.
